title: Web Development
heroText: We craft web solutions that drive growth.
detailText: Our web development team creates tailored digital experiences that combine performance, design, and scalability. From business websites to enterprise-level applications, we ensure your online presence is impactful and future-ready.
cardDetailText: Build modern, responsive, and scalable websites that deliver both performance and user engagement.

serviceCards.title: Custom Website Design
serviceCards.description: We create unique, brand-focused designs that reflect your identity.

serviceCards.title: Responsive Development
serviceCards.description: Optimized for all devices and screen sizes.

serviceCards.title: E-Commerce Solutions
serviceCards.description: Scalable online stores with secure checkout.

serviceCards.title: SEO Friendly Development
serviceCards.description: Improving visibility and driving organic traffic.

faqs.question: What is Web Development and how does it work?
faqs.answer: Web development involves creating websites and web applications that are accessible via browsers. We handle everything from frontend to backend to deliver seamless solutions.

faqs.question: Is this service suitable for my business?
faqs.answer: Yes, we tailor solutions to fit startups, SMEs, and enterprises, ensuring scalability and performance.

faqs.question: What technologies do you use?
faqs.answer: We use React, Next.js, Node.js, PHP, and other modern frameworks to build reliable solutions.

title: Mobile Applications
detailText: We specialize in creating apps that enhance engagement and deliver value. From concept to deployment, our mobile solutions are built to scale across platforms and devices.
cardDetailText: From idea to launch, we build engaging apps that work smoothly across iOS and Android platforms.

serviceCards.title: Cross-Platform
serviceCards.description: Build once, deploy on multiple platforms.

serviceCards.title: UI/UX Design
serviceCards.description: Smooth interfaces that enhance user engagement.

serviceCards.title: Cloud Integration
serviceCards.description: Sync apps seamlessly with cloud services.

faqs.question: Do you build both iOS and Android apps?
faqs.answer: Yes, we build native and cross-platform solutions for both platforms.

faqs.question: Can you handle app store publishing?
faqs.answer: Absolutely, we assist with end-to-end deployment on the App Store and Google Play.
